documentation.content:
## Build Project Documentation (Tox)

```bash
$ tox -e docs
```

## Setup Hatch Environment and Pre-commit Hooks

```bash
$ hatch -e test run pre-commit install
```

## Install Pre-commit Hooks without Hatch

```bash
$ pip install pre-commit
$ pre-commit install
```

## Install pytest-html from source

```bash
$ pip install -e .
```

## Alternative: Wrapping py.xml.html output in str()

```python
import pytest
from py.xml import html


def pytest_html_results_table_header(cells):
    cells.insert(2, str(html.th("Description")))
    cells.insert(
        1, str(html.th("Time", class_="sortable time", data_column_type="time"))
    )
```

## Install and Run Python Tests with Tox

```bash
$ pip install tox
$ tox
```

## Build SASS/SCSS/CSS Assets (npm)

```bash
$ npm run build
```

## Generate Self-Contained Pytest HTML Report

```bash
$ pytest --html=report.html --self-contained-html
```

## Pytest HTML Extras Content Functions

```APIDOC
pytest_html.extras.url(url: str, name: str = None)
pytest_html.extras.html(html_content: str)
pytest_html.extras.text(text_content: str, name: str = None)
```
